author: Kynix @KynixXBT
text: This cycle there has been an intersting pattern to observe. All the bottoms of a leg up formed at the top of the last leg up e.g. 73k March 2024 Top, 74k April 2025 Bottom. Hence, I believe we should hold 112k. If we lose 110k convincingly, then I am wrong about aths in August.
